title: From the Archives: Masha Gessen - Examining Russia's Autocracy In "The Future Is History"
itunes:title: From the Archives: Masha Gessen - Examining Russia's Autocracy In "The Future Is History"
description:
Masha Gessen, author of "The Future Is History," compares the authoritarian behaviors of President Trump and Vladimir Putin, and breaks down the relationship between the two.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
